# Product.PromotionInfo.Visibility.hidden

**Case**

A visibility value that hides a promoted in-app purchase on the App Store on a user’s device.

## Declaration

```swift
case hidden
```

## Discussion

A promoted in-app purchase with this visibility setting isn’t visible on the App Store on a user’s device.

## Getting visibility states

- **Product.PromotionInfo.Visibility.appStoreConnectDefault**: A visibility value for a promoted in-app purchase that uses the visibility setting from App Store Connect.
- **Product.PromotionInfo.Visibility.visible**: A visibility value that makes a promoted in-app purchase visible on the App Store on a user’s device.
